explanation.expln: I would conceal my lust, but alas, it yields not to my will but breaks out like a sneeze.

உரை.expln: No sense of shame my gladdened mind shall prove,  When he returns my longing heart to bless with love.

explanation.author: Author-1
explanation.expln: I said I would feign dislike and so went (away); (but) I embraced him the moment I say my mind began to unite with him!.

explanation.author: Translation
explanation.expln: 'I 'll shun his greeting'; saying thus with pride away I went:  I held him in my arms, for straight I felt my heart relent.
